price: 24. (Y Al-lah dirá a los ángeles:) «Arrojad al infierno a todo obstinado que negaba la verdad,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
